ygData.subject: Re: Mammoths in Everfrost
ygData.msgSnippet: DE s are indeed KOS in Everfrost.  Even though you MAY be able to solo some of the lower level Mama Mammoths, Tundra Jack and Iceburg will bump into you sooner
ygData.messageBody:
DE's are indeed KOS in Everfrost. Even though you MAY be able to solo some
of the lower level Mama Mammoths, Tundra Jack and Iceburg will bump into
you sooner or later and end you rather quickly.

Sorry.


At 01:35 PM 1/1/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Aazen1@...
>
>Hello all, I recently came of my 24th seasons and I was wondering if hunting
>the grown mammoths in Everfrost would be a good idea for my level? Also, do
>you know if DEs are KOS to the Barbarian guards and roaming Barb NPCs-I would
>think so, but you never know . . .
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
>tolerated



Dave Karpman davek@...
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

The demon is a liar. He will lie to confuse us. But he will also mix lies
with the truth to attack us. The attack is psychological, but powerful. So
don't listen, remember that, do not listen.

- "The Exorcist"
